GitHub

GitHub Developer Relations Intern (Remote) 2026

Create content, demos, and community programs for GitHub developers in a remote DevRel internship.

CompanyGitHub
RoleDeveloper Relations Intern
LocationRemote
Duration12 weeks
StipendExpected/Indicative: USD 4k–6k/month
Work Hours40 hours/week
Employment TypeIntern
Experience0-2 years

Eligibility & Skills

  • Students/new grads with coding ability and content/community experience
  • Education: B.S./M.S. in CS/IT or equivalent
  • Branches allowed: Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronics, Any with coding
  • Skills: JavaScript/TypeScript or Python, Technical writing, Public speaking/recording, Git/GitHub
  • Year of study: 2026/2027 grads
  • Age limit: Per company policy

What you will work on

  • Build demo apps and sample repos for GitHub features.
  • Publish tutorials/blogs/videos and present at community events.
  • Collect developer feedback and relay to product teams.

What makes you a fit

  1. Strong Git/GitHub usage and coding samples.
  2. Clear writing/speaking; comfortable recording demos.
  3. Interest in community engagement and OSS.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Technical + content review (sample demo/writing).
  • Panel with DevRel/PM/Eng.
  • Offer with stipend and remote onboarding.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 12 March 2026.
